title: They do too have a sense of humor
author: VD
content_html:
Brent demonstrates that atheists aren’t all humorless literalists:

How many atheists does it take to change a light bulb?

One. He unscrews the dead bulb, and screws in the new one.

That’s almost as good as my favorite feminist joke:

How many feminists does it take to change a light bulb?

That’s not funny!
